name: Super Fart Man
description:
First game ever created.

What started off as just a flappy bird clone slowly became a feature creep of endless ideas.

I'll always remember this project, as it broke me and helped me understand so much about game development.

Created in 2019-2020 - 6 months development - no prior knowledge of Unity and C#

Was being developed for android, but converted to PC to be uploaded here.

*Game is not completed - breaks on level 4 *
